commands

Class Command<Symbol>

  • java.lang.Object
    • commands.Command<Symbol>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommandCellLocked, CommandCellReplace, CompoundCommand

    public class Command<Symbol>
extends java.lang.Object
    A Command which can be apply to a certain cell
    Since:
    Sunday February 24

    • Constructor Detail

      • Command

        protected Command()
        Constructor for classes extending the Command

      • Command

        public Command(CommandType type,
       Cell cell,
       Symbol becomes)
        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructor for setting up an command.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of command that is applied to the cell
        cell - The cell the command is applied to.
        becomes - What the cell should become after the command
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If precondition violated
        Precondition:
        type != null && cell != null && becomes != null && cell.value != null

      • execute

        public void execute()
             throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Executes this action
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If pre-condition is violated
        Precondition:
        executed != true
        Postcondition:
        executed = true
